text: Xuqujeꞌ ri uxlabꞌal ri xikꞌamawaꞌj che ri Cristo kꞌo chiꞌwe, man rajawaxik ta chik chi jun winaq kakꞌutuw chiꞌwach. Ri uxlabꞌal ri xikꞌamawaꞌj, qas che ri Dios xikꞌamawaꞌj wiꞌ man xaq ta esal uwach, are waꞌ ri kakꞌutuw na chiꞌwach ronojel ri jastaq. Chixjeqel bꞌa pa Cristo jacha ri xukꞌut kanoq chiꞌwach.
